definition: type A influenza/abbr. for 甲型H1N1流感/refers to H1N1 influenza of 2009

first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Why do some pandemic influenza vaccines contain adjuvants and others don't?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼甲流疫苗有輔助劑而其他疫苗沒有？

sentences.english: Internationally, the first batch of H1N1 Monovalent Vaccine was produced by Hualan Bio for pandemic vaccination.
sentences.chinese: 華蘭生物也成爲全球首批正式甲流疫苗的生產企業。

sentences.english: Pandemic flu remains moderate but strikes young: WHO.
sentences.chinese: 甲流未氾濫，但年輕人更易感染。

sentences.english: People's nervousness about swine flu vaccines is understandable.
sentences.chinese: 人們對於甲流疫苗的擔心也可以理解。

sentences.english: Nearly 5000 people worldwide are known to have died of swine flu so far.
sentences.chinese: 目前爲止全球已有至少5000人死於甲流。

sentences.english: The researchers also looked back over all the previous research into flu vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員還回顧分析了之前所有的甲流疫苗研究。

sentences.english: A mother-to-be was one of the victims.
sentences.chinese: 有一位準媽媽患了甲流。

sentences.english: Pregnant women accounted for 13 in 100 deaths from swine flu.
sentences.chinese: 每100個死於甲流的人中就有13個是懷孕女性。

sentences.english: Around 715, 000 people are estimated to have caught the infection.
sentences.chinese: 估計大概有715000人已經感染了甲流。

sentences.english: Flu shots for Wall Street stirs ire in NY.
sentences.chinese: 華爾街優先獲得甲流疫苗激起民憤。

sentences.english: If the swine flu vaccines are new, how can we be sure they're safe?
sentences.chinese: 面對全新的甲流疫苗，我們怎樣確信它是安全的呢？

sentences.english: The main impact has been seen in parts of Asia and Japan.
sentences.chinese: 甲流確實給亞洲和日本的部分地區帶來了影響。

sentences.english: Today, I finally got out of the hospital for having Swine Flu for 3 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 今天，在被甲流折磨了三週以後，我終於出院了。

sentences.english: Over 3.78m Chinese people have been inoculated with the A/H1N1 flu vaccine.
sentences.chinese: 此外，我國逾378萬人已接種甲流疫苗。

sentences.english: The number of swine flu deaths in England now stands at 97.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，甲流死亡人數現已達97人。

definition: hand foot and mouth disease, HFMD, caused by a number of intestinal viruses, usually affecting young children
to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand
